title: Copy step components from FO-04
description:
Copy the reusable step components from FO-04 to FO-05.

Files to copy from app/fo-04/components/ to app/fo-05/components/:
- step-welcome.tsx
- step-familiarity.tsx
- step-topics.tsx
- step-checkpoint.tsx
- step-background.tsx
- step-notifications.tsx
- step-paywall.tsx
- step-completion.tsx
- swipe-phase.tsx
- heart-animation.tsx

No modifications needed - these work the same in FO-05.
acceptance_criteria: All 10 step components exist in app/fo-05/components/; npm run build succeeds
closed_reason: Copied all 10 step components from FO-04 to FO-05: step-welcome, step-familiarity, step-topics, step-checkpoint, step-background, step-notifications, step-paywall, step-completion, swipe-phase, heart-animation. Build succeeded.
